title: Regards the operation of public and chartered nonpublic schools
subject: Education
Juvenile Justice
Juvenile and Family Law
Primary and Secondary Education
State and Local Government

abstracts.abstract: To amend sections 2151.354, 2152.19, 2919.24, 3313.11, 3313.411, 3313.536, 3319.222, 3319.24, 3319.31, 3319.316, 3319.391, and 3327.10; to enact sections 303.216, 519.216, 713.083, 2307.59, 3313.174, 3314.252, and 3319.3110; and to repeal section 3313.85 of the Revised Code regarding the operation of public and chartered nonpublic schools.

other_titles.title: To amend sections 2151.354, 2152.19, 2919.24, 3313.11, 3313.411, 3313.536, 3319.222, 3319.24, 3319.31, 3319.316, 3319.391, and 3327.10; to enact sections 303.216, 519.216, 713.083, 2307.59, 3313.174, 3314.252, and 3319.3110; and to repeal section 3313.85 of the Revised Code regarding the operation of public and chartered nonpublic schools.
